thread.title: Claustrophobic, smelly, unfriendly
thread.title_full: Claustrophobic, smelly, unfriendly - Review of Hampton Inn Manhattan-SoHo, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: ilovenyc2017
title: Claustrophobic, smelly, unfriendly
text:
On arrival we were made wait while unfriendly receptionist tried to log into her computer. After keeping us waiting 7 mins she advised her colleague would have to do it and when to get her. Exiting the lift to our room, a strong smell of disinfectant greeted us. Our room carpets were thread bare and dirty. Bedding hung from the bed onto same carpet. Room size was tiny for 3 people. Hotel in the middle of building site. When we returned to reception with key and informed receptionist. She did not offer us alternative room, looked at me with blank expression. We left hotel and had to find alternative accommodation.
Room Tip: Be sure to read the reviews before you book See more room tips
